section.title: ComponentRegistered:ComponentDataDelegate(String key, IHandler handler)
section.p: Event fired when a new component is registered on the kernel.

section.title: ComponentUnregistered:ComponentDataDelegate(String key, IHandler handler)
section.p: Event fired when a component is removed from the kernel.

section.title: ComponentModelCreated:ComponentModelDelegate(ComponentModel model)
section.p: Event fired after the ComponentModel is created. Allows customizations that may affect the handler.

section.title: AddedAsChildKernel:System.EventHandler()
section.p: Event fired when the kernel was added as child of another kernel.

section.title: RemovedAsChildKernel:System.EventHandler()
section.p: Event fired when the kernel was removed from being a child of another kernel.

section.title: ComponentCreated:ComponentInstanceDelegate(ComponentModel model, Object instance)
section.p: Event fired before the component is created.

section.title: ComponentDestroyed:ComponentInstanceDelegate(ComponentModel model, Object instance)
section.p: Event fired when a component instance destroyed.

section.title: HandlerRegistered:HandlerDelegate(IHandler handler, Boolean stateChanged)
section.p: Event fired when a new handler is registered (it might be in a valid or waiting dependency state)

section.title: DependencyResolving:DependencyDelegate(ComponentModel client, DependencyModel model, Object dependency)
section.p: Event fired when a dependency is being resolved, it allows the dependency to be changed, but the client ComponentModel must not be altered.
